    root /var/www/alpha/alpha/current/public;

}

# HTTPS

    listen 443;
    server_name alpha.linuxfr.org;
    access_log /var/log/nginx/alpha.access.log;
    root /var/www/alpha/alpha/current/public;

    # SSL
    ssl on;
    ssl_certificate server.crt;
    ssl_certificate_key server.key;
